masked_phrase: Government of the people, by the people, for the people, shall not perish from the [MASK].

The buck stops [MASK].
[MASK] we can. - Obama

The price of [MASK] is eternal vigilance.
Injustice anywhere is a [MASK] to justice everywhere.
Man is by nature a political [MASK].
The ends justify the [MASK].

Let them [MASK] cake.
